welcome_message_title: Welcome to Ho Chi Minh City
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ho Chi Minh City, where the bustling streets, rich history, and delicious street food await you. Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this vibrant city and explore all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!
